Class CaveObstacle.Chunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • CaveObstacle.Chunk
  • Enclosing class:
    CaveObstacle

    public static class CaveObstacle.Chunk
extends java.lang.Object
    "Chunks" are the objects that make the floor/ceiling of the cave rough and bumpy. These are different from the regular spikes/stalagtites/stalagmites that are in the cave.
    Author:
    Patrick Thomas

      • Chunk

        public Chunk(CaveObstacle.Chunk chunk,
             int r_height,
             int w)
        Constructor for a chunk. Meant to extend a range of chunks given another chunk and a new width and leg height.
        Parameters:
        chunk - Chunk Chunk to extend to the right
        r_height - int Height of right leg
        w - int Width of base

      • collide_hat_with_rect

        public boolean collide_hat_with_rect(Geometry.Rect r)
        Collides the triangle with a rectangle. Uses the collide point method with every single point of a rectangle.
        Parameters:
        r - Geometry.Rect, used for its 4 corners
        Returns:
        boolean, true if colliding, false if not
